item.title: Show HN：我建立了一个占星术AI，可以详细揭示人们的个性
item.description:
Hello guysAfter failing many features.Finally build something useful.I made a astrology ai which takes a person birth details such as dob,time and birth place as input.And give a tailored response on their personalities such as, loyal or not, aggressive or not, manipulative or notStill it's just a initial MVP, based on the user's feedback, will fine tune it to something better.
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=444288933 点：1 ＃评论：0
